summary: Frontend testing of Fleet Scheduling functionality completed successfully. All core features working: timeline with vehicle grouping, driver assignment dropdown, drag-and-drop booking reassignment with database persistence, and Contract Work page with vehicle preference.
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed minor bug: Driver assignment toast was showing 'undefined' because code used driver.first_name but API returns driver.name. Fixed to use driver.name || driver.first_name
context_for_next_testing_agent: Fleet Scheduling page at /scheduling is fully functional. Tested: 1) Login at /dispatch/login with admin@cjstravel.uk/admin123, 2) Navigation to Scheduling page, 3) Timeline shows vehicles grouped by type with display names (CJ's Taxi 1, CJ's Taxi 2, etc.), 4) Driver assignment dropdown shows driver names correctly (James Wilson, John Driver, etc.), 5) Drag-and-drop booking reassignment works and persists to database (verified via API), 6) Summary panel shows correct booking counts, 7) Contract Work page has vehicle preference dropdown. Minor fix applied for driver name display in toast notification.

features_tested.timeline_vehicle_grouping: PASS - Vehicles grouped by type with display names (e.g., CJ's Taxi 1, CJ's 16 Minibus 1)
features_tested.driver_assignment_dropdown: PASS - Shows driver names correctly (James Wilson, John Driver, Chris Newhouse, etc.)
features_tested.drag_and_drop_reassignment: PASS - Booking CJ-061 successfully moved from CJ's Taxi 1 to CJ's Taxi 2, database updated
features_tested.summary_panel: PASS - Shows correct counts (6 Total Bookings, 2 Vehicles Used after drag)
features_tested.contract_work_page: PASS - Vehicle preference dropdown available in booking form
